channel.title: Suggest-a-Tutorial
channel.description:
Yeah basicly fire ideas at me :). Nothing too long and nothing to do with spawning objects/npcs/making a new area ect. So i shouldn't get any "mi server liek needs a kewl trainin areaa plz help!"
To mods intending to lock: These tuts (only the sensible ones) will be [b]help[/b]ful to the requesters and most likely others.
Currently working on: - :|

item.title: Suggest-a-Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

Full ranging with arrow timers and other range items such as throwing knives, axes and darts.

Also, why are you creating an instance of a class in your forum name for the class Nub when you can already do Nub.method1(); without the instance (if the method1 is static, of course, if not you owuld have to create an instance of the class anyways). Also, if you’re going to create an instance of a class, why not use a different name like “N” for the instance instead of the default name “Nub”.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest-a-Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

PVP following; if Player A attacks Player B, and Player B decides to run, Player A will continue attacking Player B while he is running.
